name: Project Zomberries
description:
Project Zomberries is a Horror game where the player ventures to a zombie infested island in search of immortality.  Find the 6 sacrificial dolls scattered around the island and use your ammo sparingly to protect yourself from the undead. This game was made for Callum Uptons Game Jam from July 16th to July 25th.

 You can check out the project's git hub here: https://github.com/ashw2002/ZomBerries.
